skillTree.name: Blessing of the Volcano God
skillTree.description: Every army needs a warrior with a fire burning in their belly. Literally.

skillTree.name: Fire Within
skillTree.description: A sword of searing heat cuts through flesh as if tearing through a damp scroll.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Wanderer
skillTree.description: "Da Wanderer, they call 'im da Wanderer – 'e roams around, around, around, around, around."

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Firebrand
skillTree.description: Scorch the earth and set whole cities aflame – the Fire Mouth will claim all in the infernal blaze.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2

skillTree.name: Incendiary
skillTree.description: Even walls cannot protect you from a fire that cannot be quenched.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Destroyer
skillTree.description: Those who have gorged upon the magma of the Fire Mouth harness the very essence of its burning rage.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Magma Incarnate
skillTree.description: The best offence is a good defence. And the best form of defence is to belch an impenetrable wall of flame.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_scouting}}
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_damage_walls}}
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_wound}}
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_block_army}}
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Farter
skillTree.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

skillTree.name: Flabby
skillTree.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

skillTree.name: Big Daddy
skillTree.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

skillTree.name: Maw Preacher
skillTree.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."
